name: Hacking simulator
description:
Do you want to become a hacker and attack unsuspecting targets.
oh you do, perfect.

use the terminal to hack your randomly generated targets. currently only the tutorial is available but the game will be much more than that.

tips:

  • to disable antivirus, you need to use the "mail" to send a "Trojan"
  • to find the password you need to send a password carcker
  • to see encrypted files you need to "decrypt" the "files"
  • I highly suggest playing through the tutorial first, to undrstand how everything works

next version futures:
more security measures, we are accepting ideas
planned: firewall
something interesting when gaining access to the target(like a windows desktop you can mess around with)(that's going to take a while to make though...)

NOTICE: THIS GAME HAS BEEN COUGHT AS A VIRUS BY SOME ANTIVIRUSES, I DID NOT PROGRAM IT WITH A VIRUS BUT I SUGGEST NOT DOWNLOADING IT... DEVELOPMENT CANCELED... THIS GAME MIGHT EVENTUALLY BE REUPLOADED WHEN THE VIRUS PROBLEM IS SOLVED.

DISCLAIMER:this game has nothing to do with real hacking nor is it similar to real hacking and it is designed for entertainment purposes only.
